paper_abstract: We present formulas for computations involving companion matrix pencils as may arise in considering polynomial eigenvalue problems. In particular, we provide explicit companion matrix pencils for matrix polynomials expressed in a variety of polynomial bases including monomial, orthogonal, Newton, Lagrange, and Bernstein/Bezier bases. Additionally, we give a pair of explicit LU factors associated with each pencil and a prescription for block pivoting when required. (c) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Block LU factors of generalized companion matrix pencils
